We have a goal to deliver it all. We offer our users an exciting, fun, and most importantly, safe gambling experience.As a campaign manager to guarantee your payment I am holding 0.0720 btc (≈ $1,200)The address will be topped up regularly as we progress each week.Escrow addressbc1q4san45lzyc0pv9t2ts2d09cl2ypn6yztyg36a0w9xemkkyy2a4hsxlufmtCampaign rewardsSr. Members+: $2.00 per post up to 15 posts each weekFull members: $1.50 per post up to 15 posts each weekMembers: $0.80 per post up to 15 posts each weekTo prevent AI domination effective from today we are introducing an incentive for forum users. Find AI written posts on this campaignand report to me either in public or in forum PM, please be sure you have enough reference to support the claim. For successful reportthe reporter will receive the weekly payment instead of the accused campaigner.
